title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 13, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 13, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark reconnect to talk about a confusing mistake made by Governor Gavin Newsom's team in regards to his recall, review some names that have been reportedly associated with Jeffery Epstein's black book and an update on Britney Spears as well.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
